mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.spec_id AS "productSpec.id", c.spec_name as "productSpec.spec.name", a.position_id AS "position.id", b.name as "position.name", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.img_nail_url AS "imgNailUrl", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id"
left join os_position b on a.position_id=b.id left join os_product_specification c on a.spec_id =c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO os_product_image( id , spec_id , position_id , img_url , img_nail_url , create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productSpec.id}, #{position.id}, #{imgUrl}, #{imgNailUrl}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id} )
